deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
allows the user to join the game by transferring their robot NFT to the game contract, 
and records the robot's data including the block number at which it joined

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Error Robot NFT OutGame: Haven't joined the game"

arguments.value: Error Robot NFT OutGame: Haven't joined the game

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Error Robot NFT OutGame: Haven't joined the game"

documentation.text:
allows a user to remove their robot NFT from the game. 
If the user's robot is currently in the process of learning, 
the function stops the learning process. 
The function returns an error if the robot could not be removed from the game.

removes the NFT robot of a specified 'user' from the game contract 
if the robot has been in the game for a specified amount of time.

removes the NFT robot of a specified 'user' from the game contract 
if the robot has been in the game for a specified amount of time.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

LetRobotNFTJoinToGame(uint256).notice: allows the user to join the game by transferring their robot NFT to the game contract,  and records the robot's data including the block number at which it joined

LetRobotNFTOutOfGame().notice: allows a user to remove their robot NFT from the game.  If the user's robot is currently in the process of learning,  the function stops the learning process.  The function returns an error if the robot could not be removed from the game.
